titles.title: CB 45 Worthy, Oh Worthy Are You, Lord

properties.copyright: Â©1976 The Servants of the Word (The Copyright Company)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
WORTHY, OH WORTHY ARE YOU, LORD,
Worthy to be thanked and praised and worshiped
and adored.
(Repeat)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Singing Hallelujah, Lamb upon the throne; we
worship and adore You, we make Your glory
known. Hallelujah, glory to the King. You're more
than a conq'ror, and You're Lord of everything.
